response.overview: Hired by a powerful member of the Russian mafia to avenge an FBI sting that left his brother dead, a psychopathic hitman known only as The Jackal proves an elusive target for the people charged with the task of bringing him down: a deputy FBI director, a Russian MVK Major,  and a jailed IRA terrorist who can recognize him.
response.tagline: How do you stop an assassin who has no identity?
response.title: The Jackal

results.name: The Jackal Official Trailer #1 - Bruce Willis Movie (1997) HD
